Basic Functions

some basic functions in numerical analysis, you could use.

Usage

Functions

NumericalAnalysis.NthDerivative — Method
NthDrivative(f::Function, x::Real, n::Int)

return the nth derivative value at x

source

absolute_error(x, x̂)

source

return the number ξ(x) bwteen x₀ and x.
